articles.title: Germany, France among nations to resume use of AstraZeneca vaccine after regulators back shot - Reuters
articles.description: Germany, France and other European nations announced plans to resume using AstraZeneca's COVID-19 vaccine on Thursday after EU and British regulators moved to shore up confidence in the shot, saying its benefits outweigh the risks.
